title: Chao Jiachong Zhan Ji Sheng Yu Chuanshuo
synopsis: Elementary school students Jiang Tianyu, Han Jialan and Qiu Yala encountered the super beetle of the unicorn tribe in an extracurricular activity, and even accidentally entered the mysterious space super beetle field. Here, an unknown virus is spreading, causing the forests to wither and die, and the homes of super beetles are constantly being eroded. Facing the crisis of losing their forest homes, the unicorn tribe and the deer bee tribe had a disagreement and declared war. In order to defend the forest homeland, the Super Beetles and the three of them have joined forces to become the Super Beetle Warriors. Faced with numerous difficulties and threats from hostile races, we all work together to overcome various difficulties and restore the destroyed Super Beetle Forest Home and the human world. nature! (translated from iqiyi)
